title: Bleckmann opens new distribution center in Spain
summary:
Bleckmann has announced the opening of a new distribution center in Riudellots, Spain, as the supply chain management partner for fashion and lifestyle brands seeks to strengthen is position in Southern Europe and improve logistics solutions in the region.

The multi-user facility has a total storage capacity of just under 10,000m2, with 10 loading docks. It features unloading conveyors, RFID tunnels and 20 pallet trucks, and is compliant with PCI standards and equipped with an activity license.

title: Evri and SF International to strengthen cross-border and logistics collaboration
summary:
Evri and SF International will ‘explore opportunities’ to streamline cross-border shipping, improve service efficiency and develop joint solutions for retailers and consumers in the e-commerce market, as part of a memorandum of understanding (MoU) announced on December 8, 2025. There are also plans to assess other international markets beyond China, including the US and Australia.

The agreement builds on an existing agreement between the UK parcel operator and the Chinese multinational logistics provider, and reflects the growing collaboration between the UK and China in the industry.
